body.p: I was one of the Jury that tried Thomas Snyder, I was the last to conscent to find a verdict of guilty, but as I did agree to the verdict, and as I have made it a rule never to sighn a petition for a pardon. I refused with the eleven to sighn. This much I say, that your Excellency may see that it is not harshness to Thomas Snyder, but only carrying out a rule of my life
I, James P Chambers clerk of Jeff Circuit Court, do certify that the above named A Van Deventer is one of the Jurors who convicted Thomas Snyder in said Court.

Jas P Chambers clk
by J R Redding D C.
